scripts.text:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS [Audit].[mig_objects_list]
CREATE TABLE [Audit].[mig_objects_list] (
    id int identity(1,1),
    objectname varchar(1000),
    systemname varchar(1000),
    category varchar(1000),
    sql varchar(4000),
    enabled int,
    order_position int,
    insert_datetime datetime default GETDATE()
);
